# include <iostream>
# include <vector>
# include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define rep(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
int main()
{
   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
   int t,a,i,j,n;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  {
  	j=0;
  	cin>>n;
  	rep(i,1,n+1)
  	{
  	cin>>a;
  	int p=a/i;
  	j=j^(p&1);
  	}
  	cout<<(j?"ALICE":"BOB")<<endl;
  }
 
}
